title: Lazy Longanisa (Filipino-Style Breakfast Sausage)
ingredients: 1 pound smoked kielbasa sausage, cut into thick slices
method: Step 1: Combine sausage, brown sugar, vinegar, and soy sauce in a large resealable plastic bag; toss to coat sausage with marinade. Squeeze out excess air and seal the bag. Marinate in the refrigerate 2 hours to overnight.
Step 2: Pour sausage mixture into a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add water and vegetable oil; cook and stir until liquid is reduced and sausage is browned, about 15 minutes.
